description: Foundational, model-agnostic training datasets for explicit MSP-1 protocol understanding, including deterministic generation/validation behaviors and safe refusal patterns when required inputs are missing.
notes: Baseline is intentionally model-agnostic and avoids persona or vendor-specific phrasing.
Datasets teach MSP-1 protocol literacy and deterministic behavior (including refusal when required inputs are missing).
Datasets are not a source of live page facts; use MSP-1 metadata and page content for page-specific/time-sensitive information.
